subject: Politics and Government
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dave Bing, the N.B.A. Hall of Famer, is running for mayor in a special election against Mayor Kenneth V. Cockrel Jr., who is also a Democrat, on May 5.
snippet: Dave Bing, the N.B.A. Hall of Famer, is running for mayor in a special election against Mayor Kenneth V. Cockrel Jr., who is also a Democrat, on May 5.
